video_title: Your brain connects to other brains...  ðŸ’­#mindset #positivity #adviceoftheday #positivity
transcript:
did you know that your brain connects to
other people's brains check this out
have you ever noticed how hard it is not
to cry when you see somebody else crying
well the reason why is there's something
in your brain called mirror neurons
mirror neurons are when your brain will
mirror somebody else's neurons mimic
them and then you will feel what that
person is feeling this is why you have
to be very diligent about who you
surround yourself with and that you
surround yourself with the right people
if you surround yourself with negative
people who are lazy who complain all day
taking action is going to be really
really hard for you negativity can be
contagious stress can be contagious
sadness can be contagious but also if
those are contagious good emotions are
contagious as well if you surround
yourself with people who are driven who
look at the bright side of things and
take action it will be easier for you to
be motivated and to take action towards
the life that you want so be very
careful who you surround yourself with
because you will start to become just
like they are
